name: Sea Monster (shadoweeq)
description:
Avoid the big sea monster - Angler Fish!

  • W/S - Move
  • A/D - Rotate
  • SHIFT - Small Dash

Angler Fish has 3 phases:

  • Hunting for you and can be hit by bombs
  • Swimming randomly for a while
  • Hunting for you and can yet bombs at you when he touches one

You have 3 lives and the score goes up every phase completed. After the completed phase, the next is chosen randomly between those 3. There's no end, the game is infinite.
